confirmed_facts: BYD Korea officially opened the BYD Auto Songpa showroom on 2025-11-26
The showroom is located directly in front of Seokchon Gobun Station on Seoul Subway Line 9
The showroom serves the Seoul Songpa district and surrounding areas such as Wirae, Munjeong, and Gangdong
The opening aims to expand brand experience for customers in Seoulâ€™s southeastern region
The showroom will feature a special exhibition of the BYD Premium brand Yangwang U8 until December 7
BYD Korea currently operates 24 showrooms nationwide and plans to reach 30 by yearâ€‘end
